summary: This is a confidential internal memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York regarding the suicide watch and psychological observation status of Jeffrey Epstein and another inmate, Lopez, on the morning of July 29, 2019. It indicates Epstein was pending bedspace for the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054, pending bedspace for Special Housing Unit (SHU) on the morning of July 29, 2019.

persons.name: Lopez
persons.context: Listed as inmate #20472-038, mentioned in the psychological observation update.

events.title: Morning Status Update on Epstein
events.description: Internal memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center provides a morning update on suicide watch and psychological observation status for inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein who is noted as 'Pending Bedspace for SHU'.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center
locations.address: 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: Federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: The document is a confidential internal status update from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated July 29, 2019.
It reports that Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was 'Pending Bedspace for SHU' (Special Housing Unit) that morning.
The document indicates no one was on suicide watch, but psychological observation was in place for at least two inmates, including Epstein and another inmate named Lopez.
The memo is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and contains a warning about handling sensitive information.
